subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Unexpected aspects of the 469
author: Chad Wiggins
full_text:
--0-1994970382-1219072884=:23327
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Actually, I went to the Old Roswell Cemetery. Which one are you talking about? I'd love to go.

Chad



----- Original Message ----
From: "Fransen, Debbie" <debbie.fransen@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, August 18, 2008 10:32:37 AM
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Unexpected aspects of the 469


Chad,
If you went to the cemetary with H.Analyst, I probably know 
which one you went to.
There are some not so nice things that happen at that 
cemetary.... .
Deb


________________________________
 From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
[mailto:EVP- ITC@yahoogroups. com] On Behalf Of Zack Widup
Sent: Monday, August 18, 2008 10:31 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Unexpected aspects of 
the 469



I haven't experienced the EVP/ITC, but many cemeteries have guardians 
that 
try to ward you off in various ways. From my experience, if they 
finally 
decide you're not there to do harm they will kind of back off and 
leave 
you alone.

A simple thing like straightening a skewed tombstone 
or cleaning up a mess 
will convince them you're not there to harm. Also, 
tell them that you're 
not there to do damage.

Zack

On Mon, 18 
Aug 2008, Chad wrote:

> Just wondering if you guys have ever 
experienced anything like what
> I'm about to describe.
>
> I 
was doing an investigation at a cemetery the other night. My
> girlfriend 
was using the 469 with headphones. It started to spook her
> a little and 
she gave me the box. I put in the headphones and didn't
> hear anything 
out of the normal radio scan. Then I heard footsteps
> circling me. I 
started looking around and asked if anyone else was
> hearing them. I then 
got attacked by an entity in the cemetery. It
> felt a lot like a 
schoolyard bully circling you before he hits you,
> and then a big rush of 
energy. I can't really describe the feeling.
>
> Then, the other 
night I was on a separate investigation and was in a
> bathroom. I was 
hearing water dripping, but when I checked the
> possible sources they 
were bone dry.
>
> Is it possible that these noises can come clearly 
through the 469? I
> do not have any psychic ability I know of. They are 
very real, and are
> definitely happening, not being imagined. Maybe it 
has something to do
> with the headphones? I cannot explain this. Have any 
of you had a
> similar experience?
>
>
> 
------------ --------- --------- ------
>
> Yahoo! 
Groups Links
>
>
>
>
